description:
'''Short description:'''

This product integrates sea level observations aggregated and validated from the Regional EuroGOOS consortium (Arctic-ROOS, BOOS, NOOS, IBI-ROOS, MONGOOS) and Black Sea GOOS as well as from the Global telecommunication system (GTS) used by the Met Offices.

'''DOI (product) :'''   
https://doi.org/10.17882/93670
title: Global Ocean - Delayed Mode Sea level product

providers.name: Copernicus Marine Service
providers.description: Copernicus Marine Service - Mercator Ocean International
